products.name: Buster Sword
products.description: A massive broadsword that carries the hopes of those who fight.

products.name: Iron Blade
products.description: Custom iron sword balanced for both offense and defense.

products.name: Hardedge
products.description: Heavy broadsword designed to cleave enemies in two with one strike.

products.name: Mythril Saber
products.description: Blade forged with mythril. Enhances magic power of its wielder.

products.name: Twin Stinger
products.description: Beautifully ornamented sword that excels at channeled magic attacks.

products.name: Ultima Weapon
products.description: Cloud's ultimate sword, strength rising when HP is full.

products.name: Gatling Gun
products.description: Standard-issue firearm prosthetic with rapid-fire capability.

products.name: Assault Gun
products.description: Improved gun-arm with higher firepower and accuracy.

products.name: Atomic Scissors
products.description: A melee arm upgrade that deploys sharp shears for close combat.

products.name: Big Bertha
products.description: Massive cannon arm that packs a tremendous punch with each shot.

products.name: EKG Cannon
products.description: Experimental gun-arm that fires blasts of condensed mako energy.

products.name: Missing Score
products.description: Barret's ultimate gun-arm, its power grows with AP of equipped Materia.

products.name: Leather Glove
products.description: Basic leather gloves offering minimal combat enhancement.

products.name: Metal Knuckles
products.description: Sturdy metal knuckles that boost punching power.

products.name: Sonic Strikers
products.description: Gloves with built-in shock mechanisms to strike with sonic speed.

products.name: Powersoul
products.description: Mystical gloves whose damage increases when the wielder is in peril.

products.name: Premium Heart
products.description: Tifa's ultimate weapon; its power surges as her Limit gauge fills.

products.name: Guard Stick
products.description: A simple wooden staff used by Aerith for self-defense.

products.name: Mythril Rod
products.description: Rod inset with mythril that amplifies the wielder's magical power.

products.name: Silver Staff
products.description: Elegant staff decorated with silver, enhancing healing magic.

products.name: Reinforced Staff
products.description: A staff modified with defensive plating to protect its wielder.

products.name: Princess Guard
products.description: Aerith's ultimate staff, imbued with holy power to safeguard allies.

products.name: Mythril Clip
products.description: A headdress lined with mythril to slightly boost Red XIII's magic.

products.name: Magic Comb
products.description: An ornate comb that channels magical energy with each strike.

products.name: Diamond Pin
products.description: Headpiece tipped with diamond for increased damage and sheen.

products.name: Limited Moon
products.description: Red XIII's ultimate weapon, harnessing cosmic energy for maximum power.

products.name: 4-Point Shuriken
products.description: A balanced shuriken with four prongs, Yuffie's trusty throwing star.

products.name: Boomerang
products.description: A weighted boomerang that returns to the thrower after slicing foes.

products.name: Steel Reaper
products.description: A giant shuriken forged of dark steel, capable of heavy damage.

products.name: Conformer
products.description: Yuffie's ultimate throwing weapon that grows more powerful against strong foes.

products.name: Quicksilver
products.description: Lightweight handgun issued to the Turks, quick to draw and fire.

products.name: Sniper CR
products.description: Long-barreled rifle with high accuracy for picking off distant targets.

products.name: Shotgun
products.description: Short-range firearm that fires a spread of pellets to cover a wide area.

products.name: Death Penalty
products.description: Vincent's ultimate firearm, said to grow stronger with every creature it kills.

products.name: Yellow M-phone
products.description: A cute yellow megaphone that mildly amplifies Cait Sith's voice and power.

products.name: Green Megaphone
products.description: A green megaphone that broadcasts motivating tunes to allies.

products.name: Trumpet Shell
products.description: A silver megaphone styled like a trumpet, capable of calling powerful sound blasts.

products.name: HP Shout
products.description: Cait Sith's ultimate megaphone; its power echoes with the hearts of the team.

products.name: Fire Materia
products.description: Materia that grants the bearer the power of fire magic.

products.name: Ice Materia
products.description: Materia orb enabling the casting of ice magic spells.

products.name: Lightning Materia
products.description: Materia imbued with lightning, allowing the use of lightning magic.

products.name: Earth Materia
products.description: Materia that taps into earth magic, shaking the ground beneath foes.

products.name: Poison Materia
products.description: Materia filled with toxic mako, used to cast Bio and poison enemies.

products.name: Healing Materia
products.description: Materia that enables restorative magic like Cure to mend wounds.

products.name: Cleansing Materia
products.description: Materia that grants spells to purge poisons and ailments.

products.name: Revival Materia
products.description: Rare Materia allowing the user to revive fallen allies with Life magic.

products.name: Barrier Materia
products.description: Materia that conjures defensive barriers like Protect and Shell.

products.name: Time Materia
products.description: Materia that governs time, enabling spells like Haste or Slow.

products.name: Destruct Materia
products.description: Materia that shatters magical defenses and even life force (DeBarrier/Death).

products.name: Gravity Materia
products.description: Materia that manipulates gravity to crush foes with Demi spells.

products.name: Transform Materia
products.description: Materia enabling one to transfigure enemies with spells like Mini or Toad.

products.name: Mystify Materia
products.description: Materia that confounds enemies with spells causing Confusion or Berserk.

products.name: Seal Materia
products.description: Materia that seals enemy abilities using Sleep or Silence spells.

products.name: Comet Materia
products.description: Materia calling down destructive comet magic from the sky.

products.name: Contain Materia
products.description: High-tier materia with four potent spells: Freeze, Break, Tornado, and Flare.

products.name: Full Cure Materia
products.description: Materia that ultimately grants a spell to fully restore an ally's HP.

products.name: Shield Materia
products.description: Materia that bestows the ultimate defense spell to nullify attacks.

products.name: Ultima Materia
products.description: Materia containing Ultima, the ultimate offensive magic.

products.name: Ifrit Materia
products.description: Summon materia calling Ifrit, the fiery inferno to scorch enemies.

products.name: Shiva Materia
products.description: Summon materia calling Shiva, the frost queen who freezes all enemies.

products.name: Ramuh Materia
products.description: Summon materia calling Ramuh, the sage who smites foes with lightning.

products.name: Titan Materia
products.description: Summon materia calling Titan, who pounds the earth to crush opponents.

products.name: Odin Materia
products.description: Summon materia calling Odin, the knight who may cleave enemies in twain.

products.name: Leviathan Materia
products.description: Summon materia calling Leviathan, the water serpent of Wutai legends.

products.name: Bahamut Materia
products.description: Summon materia calling Bahamut, the dragon king who fires Mega Flare.

products.name: Neo Bahamut Materia
products.description: Summon materia for Neo Bahamut, unleashing an even mightier Giga Flare.

products.name: Bahamut ZERO Materia
products.description: Summon materia for Bahamut ZERO, raining down the ultimate cosmic flare.

products.name: Alexander Materia
products.description: Summon materia calling Alexander, the holy machine that smites with divine light.

products.name: Phoenix Materia
products.description: Summon materia containing Phoenix, reviving allies and immolating foes with sacred fire.

products.name: Hades Materia
products.description: Summon materia for Hades, the lord of the underworld who curses all enemies.

products.name: Typhon Materia
products.description: Summon materia calling Typhon (Typoon), who wreaks havoc with chaotic winds.

products.name: Knights of the Round Materia
products.description: Legendary summon materia containing 13 holy knights for an unparalleled onslaught.

products.name: Steal Materia
products.description: Command materia that lets you steal items from enemies (upgrades to Mug).

products.name: Sense Materia
products.description: Command materia enabling the user to assess an enemy's HP and weaknesses.

products.name: Throw Materia
products.description: Command materia allowing the user to throw gil or items for damage.

products.name: Morph Materia
products.description: Command materia that transforms weakened enemies into items.

products.name: Deathblow Materia
products.description: Command materia granting a powerful strike that often lands a critical hit.

products.name: Manipulate Materia
products.description: Command materia enabling control over an enemyâ€™s actions.

products.name: Mime Materia
products.description: Command materia that allows the user to mimic the last action performed.

products.name: Enemy Skill Materia
products.description: Unique materia that lets you learn and use enemies' special attacks.

products.name: Slash-All Materia
products.description: Command materia altering the Attack command to strike all foes at once.

products.name: Double Cut Materia
products.description: Command materia enabling two (and later four) consecutive attacks.

products.name: W-Item Materia
products.description: Command materia allowing the use of two items in one turn.

products.name: W-Magic Materia
products.description: Command materia allowing two magic spells to be cast in one turn.

products.name: W-Summon Materia
products.description: Command materia allowing two summons to be called in one turn.

products.name: All Materia
products.description: Support materia that enables spells to affect all targets instead of one.

products.name: Elemental Materia
products.description: Support materia that imbues weapons or armor with the paired materia's element.

products.name: Added Effect Materia
products.description: Support materia linking to add status effects to equipment.

products.name: Added Cut Materia
products.description: Support materia linking to add a follow-up physical attack when using the paired materia.

products.name: MP Turbo Materia
products.description: Support materia that boosts power of the paired magic at increased MP cost.

products.name: MP Absorb Materia
products.description: Support materia that allows the user to drain MP when using the paired ability.

products.name: HP Absorb Materia
products.description: Support materia that allows the user to drain HP when using the paired ability.

products.name: Sneak Attack Materia
products.description: Support materia that triggers the paired command or magic at the start of battle.

products.name: Final Attack Materia
products.description: Support materia that lets a user cast a paired spell automatically when KO'd.

products.name: Magic Counter Materia
products.description: Support materia that counterattacks with the paired magic when hit.

products.name: Command Counter Materia
products.description: Support materia that counterattacks with the paired command materia when hit.

products.name: Quadra Magic Materia
products.description: Support materia that allows the linked spell to be cast four times in one use.

products.name: Underwater Materia
products.description: Rare support materia that nullifies the time limit when fighting underwater.

products.name: HP Plus Materia
products.description: Increases the user's maximum HP when equipped.

products.name: MP Plus Materia
products.description: Increases the user's maximum MP when equipped.

products.name: Speed Plus Materia
products.description: Boosts the character's Dexterity, increasing their speed in battle.

products.name: Magic Plus Materia
products.description: Enhances the character's Magic stat for stronger spells.

products.name: Luck Plus Materia
products.description: Raises the character's Luck stat, improving critical hit and evade rates.

products.name: Gil Plus Materia
products.description: Increases gil earned from battles when equipped.

products.name: EXP Plus Materia
products.description: Increases experience gained from battles when equipped.

products.name: Enemy Lure Materia
products.description: Increases encounter rate with enemies when equipped.

products.name: Enemy Away Materia
products.description: Lowers encounter rate with enemies when equipped.

products.name: Chocobo Lure Materia
products.description: Attracts chocobos in the wild, making them easier to encounter.

products.name: Pre-Emptive Materia
products.description: Increases the chance of getting a pre-emptive strike in battle.

products.name: Cover Materia
products.description: Enables the character to occasionally take attacks meant for allies.

products.name: Counter Attack Materia
products.description: Gives a chance to counter with a basic attack when hit by a physical attack.

products.name: Long Range Materia
products.description: Allows a character to deal full damage with physical attacks from the back row.

products.name: Mega All Materia
products.description: Changes many commands (Attack, magic, etc.) to affect all targets.

products.name: HPâ†”MP Materia
products.description: Swaps the character's Max HP and Max MP values when equipped.

products.name: Potion
products.description: Restores a small amount of HP (about 100 HP).

products.name: Transference Module
products.description: Accessory that charges the Limit gauge when ATB abilities are used.

products.name: Hi-Potion
products.description: Greatly restores HP (roughly 500 HP).

products.name: X-Potion
products.description: Fully restores one character's HP.

products.name: Ether
products.description: Recovers a small amount of MP.

products.name: Turbo Ether
products.description: Recovers a large amount of MP.

products.name: Elixir
products.description: Fully restores one character's HP and MP.

products.name: Megalixir
products.description: Fully restores HP and MP of the entire party.

products.name: Phoenix Down
products.description: Revives a fallen ally from KO with a little HP.

products.name: Antidote
products.description: Cures Poison.

products.name: Echo Screen
products.description: Cures Silence.

products.name: Maiden's Kiss
products.description: Cures Frog status.

products.name: Soft
products.description: Cures Petrify (Stone) status.

products.name: Hyper
products.description: Cures Sadness, but causes Fury.

products.name: Tranquilizer
products.description: Cures Fury, but causes Sadness.

products.name: Remedy
products.description: Cures all status ailments for one character.

products.name: Grenade
products.description: Deals minor fire damage to all enemies in range.

products.name: Smoke Bomb
products.description: Enables escape from battle by creating a cloud of smoke.

products.name: Tent
products.description: Fully restores HP/MP of the party at a save point or world map.

products.name: Power Wrist
products.description: Accessory that raises a character's Strength.

products.name: Protect Vest
products.description: Accessory that raises Defense to protect the wearer.

products.name: Talisman
products.description: Accessory that increases the Spirit of the wearer for magic defense.

products.name: Champion Belt
products.description: Accessory that boosts HP and Strength, favored by seasoned fighters.

products.name: Ribbon
products.description: Legendary accessory that protects the wearer from all negative status effects.
